item.title: Circular has an app to make sure its new smart ring fits perfectly on your finger - Android Authority
item.description:
Circular has an app to make sure its new smart ring fits perfectly on your finger

Publication Date: January 2025, Source: Android Authority

The Circular Ring 2 is the latest smart ring from Circular, featuring advanced health tracking capabilities and a new app designed for easy sizing.

  • The Circular Ring 2 is a follow-up to the company’s first device.
  • It features an FDA-cleared AFib detection algorithm and ECG capabilities.
  • The new smart ring will be available for $380 in February or March 2025.
“This tool you can use with your smartphone is the first of its kind in the space.”

Circular's innovative approach aims to enhance user experience in fitness tracking by ensuring a perfect fit with a digital sizing tool.

item.title: This fuzzy, purse-mounted robot is designed to ‘delight bystanders’ - TechCrunch
item.description:
This fuzzy, purse-mounted robot is designed to ‘delight bystanders’

Date: 2 hours ago | Source: TechCrunch

A new robot named Mirumi, unveiled by Yukai Engineering at CES 2025, is designed to entertain and engage passersby as it mounts to a purse and interacts with its surroundings.

  • The robot mimics a furball with the ability to turn and express curiosity and bashfulness.
  • Mirumi's design draws inspiration from babies, aiming to replicate joyful interactions seen in human infant behavior.
  • Developed during an in-house innovation event, it reflects the quirky and unique nature of Yukai's previous robots.
“Designed to re-create people’s joyful experiences of noticing a human baby as he/she tries to interact with them,” Yukai says regarding Mirumi's functionality.

This innovative technology showcases Yukai Engineering's commitment to creating delightful and engaging robotic experiences that bring joy to their users.

item.title: MSI announced new QD-OLED monitors with up to 500Hz refresh rate ahead of CES 2025 - Sportskeeda
item.description:
MSI announced new QD-OLED monitors with up to 500Hz refresh rate ahead of CES 2025

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Sportskeeda

MSI has announced a new range of 2025 monitors leveraging QD-OLED technology, designed to cater to different classes of gamers. The monitors will be showcased at CES 2025, providing gamers a preview of what to expect.

  • MSI MPG 272URX QD-OLED - 27-inch OLED with 4K resolution and 240Hz refresh rate.
  • MSI MPG 272QR QD-OLED X50 - 27-inch QD-OLED with a native refresh rate of 500Hz, ideal for eSports.
  • MSI MPG 322URX QD-OLED - Similar to the MPG 272URX but with a larger 32-inch display.
  • New Mini-LED monitor (MSI MPG 274URDFW E16M) featuring dual-mode technology for 4K at 160Hz or 1080p at 320Hz.
“The MSI MPG 272URX has secured the CES 2025 Innovation Award for its visual superiority.”

MSI's announcements highlight its commitment to advancing monitor technology and addressing gamers' needs with tailored features.

item.title: All variants of this Android phone of the year candidate will have IP68/69 protection - PhoneArena
item.description:
OnePlus 13 to Feature IP68/69 Ratings for Global Variants

Publication Date: January 7, 2024

Source: PhoneArena

The OnePlus 13 is set to be unveiled globally, promising robust IP68/69 protection against dust and water. This news highlights the enhanced durability expected from this model, catering to outdoor enthusiasts and professionals alike.

  • Global variants of the OnePlus 13 will have dual IP68/IP69 ratings.
  • IP68 rating allows submersion in water up to 1.5 meters for 30 minutes.
  • IP69 rating protects against high-pressure hot water jets.
  • The phone features a 6.8-inch AMOLED display with a peak brightness of 4,500 nits.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite with configurations up to 24GB RAM.
  • Rear camera includes three 50MP sensors; front camera features 32MP.
  • Includes a 6000 mAh battery with 100W wired and 50W wireless charging.
“There is a good chance that the OnePlus 13 could be the Android phone of the year.” - Alan, PhoneArena Writer

In conclusion, the upcoming OnePlus 13 showcases advancements in smartphone durability and performance, making it a strong contender in the competitive mobile market.

item.title: Realme 14 Pro+: camera specs revealed - Digital Camera World
item.description:
Realme 14 Pro+: Camera Specifications Revealed Ahead of Launch

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Digital Camera World

The Realme 14 Pro+, a mid-range camera phone, is set to launch soon, with its camera specifications already disclosed. It features a powerful primary camera and additional modules designed for enhanced photography.

  • The primary camera includes a 50 MP Sony IMX896 sensor with OIS.
  • An 8 MP ultrawide camera offers a 112° field of view.
  • A unique triple-prism periscope telephoto lens provides a 3x focal length boost.
  • The selfie camera is expected to be 32 MP with eye-tracking AF.
  • Other specs include a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 SoC, a 6000mAh battery, and a 6.83" display.

item.title: Weekly deals: a look at renewed iPhone 16, 15, 14 and 13-series models - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
Weekly deals: a look at renewed iPhone 16, 15, 14 and 13-series models

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

The article discusses the availability and features of renewed iPhones following major shopping events. It focuses on models from the iPhone 16 series down to the iPhone 13 series, highlighting their prices, features, and trade-in options.

  • Renewed iPhone 16 models are available at similar prices to new ones, with potential savings on higher storage options.
  • iPhone 15 series introduced USB-C connectivity and features like Apple Intelligence, although the vanilla models lack some new controls.
  • The iPhone 14 series still uses the Lightning adapter but includes models with 48MP main cameras in their Pro versions.
  • The iPhone 13 series offers a compact option with the mini model and features 12MP main cameras.
  • Amazon offers trade-in deals of up to $220 for renewed phones.
“Apple devices rarely go on sale, so they are rarely featured in these weekly posts.”

This overview highlights the offerings of renewed iPhones and their advantages, especially post-holiday shopping.

item.title: Weekly deals: a look at renewed iPhone 16, 15, 14 and 13-series models - GSMArena.com
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: LG's OLED evo TVs for 2025 come with AI and a 165Hz refresh rate - Engadget
item.description:
LG's OLED evo TVs for 2025 come with AI and a 165Hz refresh rate

Date: January 2025

Source: Engadget

LG has introduced its OLED evo TV lineup for 2025 at CES, featuring advanced AI technologies and high refresh rates for enhanced viewing experiences.

  • New models powered by α (Alpha) 11 AI processor Gen2 for improved visuals.
  • Industry's first OLED TVs with 4K resolution and 165Hz refresh rate.
  • Upgraded Brightness Booster Ultimate technology for enhanced brightness.
  • AI Sound Pro delivering 11.1.2 channels of surround sound.
  • Filmmaker Mode with Ambient Light Compensation for optimal viewing conditions.
  • M5 series offers wireless transmission capabilities up to 144Hz.
“LG was notably the first in the industry to obtain the Perfect Black verification back in 2022.”

In conclusion, LG's new OLED TVs combine cutting-edge technology with user-friendly features, setting a new standard for home entertainment in 2025.

item.title: LG’s 2025 OLED TVs continue to get even better, but without MLA - Digital Trends
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Galaxy S25 Ultra picture shows slim bezels, rounder design - SamMobile - Samsung news
item.description:
Galaxy S25 Ultra Picture Reveals Slim Bezels and Rounder Design

Date: January 5, 2025 Source: Sam Mobile

The Galaxy S25 series is just weeks away from its official announcement, and a leaked image of the Galaxy S25 Ultra shows significant design changes including slimmer bezels and rounder corners.

  • Partial picture of the Galaxy S25 Ultra leaked on X by a famous leakster.
  • Display is on, highlighting the slim bezel and redesigned rounded corners.
  • Samsung is moving away from boxy designs used in the Galaxy S Ultra models since 2022.
  • The Galaxy S25 lineup to be officially launched on January 22, 2025, featuring three models with Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
“The lack of curves on the Galaxy S24 Ultra's display combined with the square corners made one-handed use rather uncomfortable.”

Overall, the design changes in the Galaxy S25 Ultra indicate a shift towards more user-friendly ergonomics and modern aesthetics.

item.title: Nvidia RTX 5090 by Inno3D leaked ahead of CES 2025 - Sportskeeda
item.description:
Nvidia RTX 5090 by Inno3D Leaked Ahead of CES 2025

Date: January 5, 2025

Source: Sportskeeda

Nvidia is set to unveil its RTX 50 series at CES 2025, but leaks regarding the RTX 5090, including the Inno3D custom variant, have already surfaced. The leak discusses aspects like the GPU's memory and cooling design.

  • The Inno3D GeForce RTX 5090 is rumored to have 32GB memory.
  • It will feature a new iChill X3 cooling design that includes RGB effects.
  • The card’s total board power (TBP) is expected to be 575W.
  • Previous leaks hint at a potential use of a 12V2x6 connector for power supply.
  • Full specifications remain speculative based on the recent renders.
"This article analyzes the new RTX 5090 leak and explains what an average consumer can expect from this custom variant."

As CES 2025 approaches, more details on the RTX 50 series are awaited, hinting at advancements in performance capabilities.

item.title: Roborock's new vacuum can pick up loose socks for you with its robotic arm - Mashable
item.description:
CES 2025: Roborock's newest vacuum can pick up loose socks for you

Publication Date: 2025
Source: Mashable

Roborock has announced a new robot vacuum, the Saros Z70, at CES 2025. This unique vacuum features a robotic arm designed to pick up various small items, making it ideal for households with kids.

  • The Roborock Saros Z70 is a circular robot vacuum with a foldable robotic arm called OmniGrip.
  • It is capable of collecting small items weighing under 300 grams, including socks and tissue paper.
  • The vacuum is set to launch in the first half of 2025, but pricing details have not yet been announced.
"Roborock insists it's the first-of-its-kind mass-produced foldable robotic arm on a robot vacuum."

This innovation could significantly improve the convenience of maintaining cleanliness in homes with children.

item.title: Nuclei flaw allows signature bypass and code execution - Security Affairs
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Galaxy S25 series: Leaker reiterates SoC and memory info, color options, and global pricing for the Galaxy S25 - Notebookcheck.net
item.description:
Galaxy S25 series: Leaker reiterates SoC and memory info, color options, and global pricing for the Galaxy S25

Date: 2025-01-05 Source: Notebookcheck

A new leak has now surfaced ahead of Unpacked, confirming and/or revealing information on the Galaxy S25 series' colorway options, chipset of choice, and onboard memory.

  • The Galaxy S25 series is set to be unveiled at Samsung's first Unpacked event of the year.
  • The devices will feature Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset globally, with no Exynos option available.
  • The S25 and S25+ will be available in Navy, Mint, Icy Blue, and Silver Shadow, while the S25 Ultra will come in Titanium Black, Silver Blue, Grey, and White Silver.
  • Pricing for the Galaxy S25 starts at €1,079 for the 512GB model.
  • The Galaxy S25 Slim is expected to launch later in the year, alongside Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7.
"12 GB of RAM comes as standard across the lineup."

In conclusion, the Galaxy S25 series promises exciting features and options, reaffirming Samsung's commitment to innovation in the smartphone market.

item.title: Samsung showcasing a massive 18.1-inch foldable OLED display at CES - SamMobile - Samsung news
item.description:
Samsung Showcases Massive 18.1-Inch Foldable OLED Display at CES

Date: January 5th, 2025 | Source: SamMobile

At CES 2025 in Las Vegas, Samsung Display revealed the world's largest foldable OLED display, measuring 18.1 inches when unfolded. This innovation reflects Samsung's ongoing commitment to advanced display technologies.

  • The foldable display measures 13.1 inches when folded.
  • It can function as a large tablet or a monitor when unfolded.
  • Samsung has not yet released a commercial product using this display.
  • Laptop manufacturers like ASUS or Lenovo may adopt the technology in the future.
“When folded, it can turn into a laptop with the top half used as the display and the bottom half as a touchscreen keyboard.”

Samsung's display advancements signal a continued evolution in flexible screen technology, despite previous setbacks in foldable device sales.

item.title: The Pixel's default Camera app isn't the end-all be-all of photography on Pixels - Android Authority
item.description:
The Pixel's default Camera app isn't the end-all be-all of photography on Pixels

Publication Date: August 2024 | Source: Android Authority

The Pixel Camera app has long been considered one of the best camera apps on the market. However, users seeking alternatives may find several other camera apps that offer different features and controls.

  • OpenCamera: A basic, no-frills app that allows extensive manual controls but lacks modern features like night mode.
  • GCam: An unofficial port of the Pixel Camera app offering better photo quality but requiring sideloading and device-specific versions.
  • ZeroCam: Focuses on minimal processing but has a subscription model and struggles in mixed lighting conditions.
  • ProShot: A paid app with a DSLR-like interface, offering a rich set of features including RAW capture and 4K video support.
“That’s it for my look at the best alternatives to the Pixel Camera app. Did we miss any picks?”

In summary, while the Pixel Camera remains a top choice, various alternatives cater to different photography needs and preferences.

item.title: Belkin’s new accessory is a magnetic power bank and camera grip rolled into one - Engadget
item.description:
Belkin’s new accessory is a magnetic power bank and camera grip rolled into one

Date: Not specified
Source: Engadget

Belkin has introduced its Stage PowerGrip, a versatile phone accessory at CES 2025 that integrates a wireless power bank, camera grip, and stand. Designed for creators and travelers, it aims to enhance smartphone photography comfort.

  • Combines a magnetic wireless power bank with a camera grip.
  • Features a 10,000mAh battery with 7.5W magnetic wireless charging.
  • Retractable USB-C cable included for convenience.
  • Comes in multiple colors including powder blue, sandbox, and more.
  • Expected to ship in May, pricing yet to be announced.
“Holding a candy-bar-shaped handset in landscape mode for long periods doesn’t feel as comfortable as the heartier grip of a dedicated camera.”

The PowerGrip is poised to make a splash in the accessories market by addressing the needs of modern smartphone photographers.

item.title: Next-Level Clean: Roborock's New Vacuum Has an Arm to Lift and Move Your Junk - PCMag
item.description:
Next-Level Clean: Roborock's New Vacuum Has an Arm to Lift and Move Your Junk

Publication Date: CES 2025

Source: PCMag

The Roborock Saros Z70 is a groundbreaking robot vacuum and mop that features a retractable mechanical arm to enhance its cleaning capabilities. It promises to take home cleaning to new heights with impressive suction power and advanced navigation technology.

  • 22,000Pa vacuum suction power with advanced TOF sensors.
  • Mechanical arm capable of picking up lightweight objects.
  • Ability to navigate and clean in three distinct passes.
  • Customizable object recognition via companion app.
  • Supports voice commands and integrates with Alexa and Google Assistant.
"The Saros Z70 can help you find your child’s missing Teddy Bear if it saw the bear during the run."

Roborock is set to release the Saros Z70 in 2025, positioning it as a significant innovation in robotic home cleaning.

item.title: CES 2025 | Roborock Saros Z70: New robot vacuum with robotic arm launching globally - Notebookcheck.net
item.description:
Roborock Saros Z70: New Robot Vacuum with Robotic Arm Launching Globally

Date: 2025-01-05

Source: Notebookcheck

The Roborock Saros Z70, the first readily available robot vacuum with a robotic arm, has been revealed. The mechanical arm can be used to lift small items out of the way, and you can even tell the robot where to place them. The new smart home device is on show at CES 2025, with features like strong suction, a slim body and an upgraded self-cleaning docking station.

  • The Saros Z70 is announced as the first mass-produced robot vacuum with a robotic arm.
  • The OmniGrip arm can move objects weighing up to 300 g (~0.7 lbs) to enhance cleaning.
  • Features include double rotating mops, StarSight navigation, and a self-cleaning dock.
  • The robot is expected to launch globally in Q2, with pricing yet to be revealed.
“The robotic arm can be used to lift small items out of the way, and you can even tell the robot where to place them.”

The Roborock Saros Z70 represents a significant leap in robotic vacuum technology, aiming to improve user convenience and cleaning efficiency.

item.title: Belkin gets the CES 2025 party started with a ton of accessories - XDA Developers
item.description:
Belkin gets the CES 2025 party started with a ton of accessories

Publication Date: January 5, 2024 Source: XDA

As CES 2025 approaches, Belkin has revealed a variety of new accessories including charging pads, audio devices, and tools for content creation. The excitement builds as tech enthusiasts look forward to the events starting on January 7, 2024.

  • Belkin is showcasing accessories in three categories: charging, audio, and content creation.
  • The BoostCharge Pro Magnetic Wireless Charging Pad offers 15W fast charging.
  • New headphones include the SoundForm Anywhere and SoundForm Isolate, with the former designed for both indoor and outdoor use.
  • Belkin aims to deliver several products by mid-2025, including power banks and a Creator Bundle.
“This year, Belkin is taking three accessory categories to the stage: charging, audio, and content creation.”

The upcoming CES will provide a platform for Belkin to exhibit its latest innovations, gathering attention from both consumers and industry professionals alike.

item.title: Roborock's New Robot Vac Has an Arm to Pick Up Dirty Socks and Underwear - CNET
item.description:
Roborock's New Robot Vac Has an Arm to Pick Up Dirty Socks and Underwear

Publication Date: January 04, 2025 | Source: CNET

Roborock has introduced its latest robot vacuum, the Saros Z70, which boasts a unique mechanical arm capable of picking up small items while cleaning.

  • The Saros Z70 features the OmniGrip, a five-axis robotic arm that can lift objects up to 10.5 ounces.
  • The vacuum also has advanced navigation with next-gen sensors and AI-powered object recognition.
  • Initial demos showed some mechanical glitches, but Roborock assures that these issues have been addressed for retail versions.
  • The vacuum can detect and avoid up to 108 different obstacles during cleaning cycles.
  • Safety features include a child lock and a safety stop button to prevent accidental grabs.
"Instead of using a traditional LDS (LIDAR) tower module for navigation, the system integrates next-gen dual-light 3D time-of-flight sensors and RGB cameras powered by AI to determine its position, surroundings and whether the object it grips is overweight." - Roborock

The Roborock Saros Z70 not only innovates with its mechanical arm but also maintains strong vacuuming capabilities with 22,000 Pa of suction power and an anti-tangle system.

item.title: Nostalgia in 2025: Why Sequels Offer Comfort Amidst Chaos - NoMusica
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Nvidia’s RTX 5090 leaks with 32GB of GDDR7 memory - The Verge
item.description:
Nvidia’s RTX 5090 leaks with 32GB of GDDR7 memory

Publication Date: Today | Source: VideoCardz

Nvidia’s unreleased RTX 5090 has surfaced with a marketing image that verifies the presence of 32GB of GDDR7 memory. The packaging reveals a 3.5-slot cooler design.

  • The RTX 5090 is expected to have double the memory of the RTX 5080.
  • It could feature 21,760 CUDA cores and a memory bandwidth of nearly 1.8TB/s.
  • The TDP is rumored to be 575 watts, exceeding the RTX 4090 by 125 watts.
  • An official announcement is anticipated during Nvidia's CES keynote.
“The RTX 5080 could debut first on January 21st, followed by Nvidia’s other RTX 50-series cards.”

The RTX 5090's release is on the horizon, with significant enhancements that promise to redefine GPU performance.

item.title: GIGABYTE Introduces 500Hz QD-OLED Gaming Monitor and 4K 240Hz Display - gizmochina
item.description:
GIGABYTE Introduces 500Hz QD-OLED Gaming Monitor and 4K 240Hz Display

Publication Date: January 3, 2025 Source: Gizmochina

GIGABYTE has launched two high-performance QD-OLED monitors aimed at gamers and professionals: the AORUS FO27Q5P with a 500Hz refresh rate and the GIGABYTE MO27U2 with a 4K resolution and 240Hz refresh rate.

  • The AORUS FO27Q5P is touted as the fastest monitor in its category with a 500Hz refresh rate.
  • It features support for DP2.1 UHBR20 bandwidth and aims to meet the ClearMR 21000 standard.
  • The GIGABYTE MO27U2 offers 4K resolution at 240Hz, ideal for gaming and professional content creation.
  • Both monitors have innovative features like GIGABYTE OLED Care for preventing burn-in and extending lifespan.
  • More details are expected to be revealed at CES 2025 starting January 7.
“The AORUS FO27Q5P features an unprecedented 500Hz refresh rate, making it the fastest monitor in its category.”

The introduction of these monitors highlights GIGABYTE's commitment to advancing display technology for gamers and professionals alike.

item.title: New Galaxy S25 leaked images show a striking similarity with the iPhone - SamMobile - Samsung news
item.description:
New Galaxy S25 Leaked Images Reveal Similarities to iPhone

Date: January 5th, 2025   Source: Sammobile

Recent leaks have showcased the design of Samsung's upcoming Galaxy S25 series, highlighting its resemblance to Apple's iPhone, especially regarding the new Qi2 wireless charging compatibility.

  • Leaked images reveal the Galaxy S25 and S25 Ultra, featuring designs akin to the iPhone.
  • The Galaxy S25 will support Qi2 wireless charging, similar to Apple's MagSafe.
  • New color options include 'Icy Blue' and 'Titanium Silver Blue.'
  • Users will need to purchase compatible cases separately to use the new features.
"This ring has become an ubiquitous flex symbol for the iPhone, much like its camera housing."

Samsung's adoption of magnetic alignment may open the door for more competition with Apple, appealing to both Samsung fans and Apple enthusiasts.

item.title: Samsung’s new QD-OLED TV panel can reach 4,000 nits brightness - SamMobile - Samsung news
item.description:
Samsung Unveils QD-OLED TV Panel with 4,000 Nits Brightness

Date: January 5, 2025

Source: SamMobile

Samsung Display has introduced its new generation QD-OLED panel that can achieve peak brightness of over 4,000 nits, showcasing its innovations at CES 2025.

  • The new fourth-generation QD-OLED panel is 30% brighter than last year’s model, which had a maximum brightness of 3,000 nits.
  • It utilizes advanced panel driving technology and new organic materials to reach this brightness.
  • Samsung will showcase a 77-inch prototype TV at CES 2025, along with a media art installation called ‘QD Jungle’ that immerses visitors in a forest-like experience.
  • Samsung may or may not fully utilize the panel's capabilities in its upcoming OLED TVs.
  • The new QD-OLED monitor panels are aimed at content creation and gaming, available in various sizes.
“Using red, green, and blue sub-pixels ensures the highest color purity compared to competitors.”

Samsung's advancements in QD-OLED technology signify an impressive leap in display capabilities, setting new benchmarks for brightness and color purity in the television industry.
